name: Blind Fish
description:
* * *

You are alone.

You are lost.

You are confused.

Surrounded by water, with no escape.

And something that you don't know is trying to reach you...

You are like a blind fish.

What will you do to escape?

* * *

Fee Stuck Studios Team

Alex Vicente

Ricard Juan

Joel López

Juan Lluis Mudarra

Charlie Bluu
